TopicTitle: Apparently kerbals like singalongs (and the Time)

Articles.Content:
As I write this, I'm on the tail end of a longhaul from my kethane miner to my main base in my tanker. ~47km is a long way to drive, and when you're driving, you notice the little things. Like when your kerbals start to bob their heads and move their mouths in unison. I wish I had a video capture program, but alas, I don't. They seemed to sing for five minutes at a time. And speaking of time, in the need of some music, I decided to put some Morris Day and the Time (Jungle Love, to be specific), and they started clapping! At the final guitar solo, Neilsen, my driver, began to wiggle his head, apparently to the music. Don't believe me? I took some rapid screen shots and turned them into a gif:

Oh yeah, they be jammin'.
Lol I've had strange and funny things like this happen before

http://www.bandicam.com/

Vid or it didn't happen!

Funny pic, though

Ninety-nine lander-cans over the Mun,

Ninety-nine lander-cans crewed.

Take one down, crash to the ground,

Ninety-eight lander-cans over the Mun...

...Sorry
